meanings.definition: A painting method in which pigments are suspended in a water-based solution.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed experimenting with watercolor in her art class.
meanings.sent2: The artist used vibrant watercolors to create a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent3: The watercolor painting of the cat wearing sunglasses made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed on the page like a delicate watercolor.
meanings.sent5: The sunset was captured in a stunning watercolor that took her breath away.
